name: grassy-seed
effect: Held: If the holder enters battle during Grassy Terrain, or if Grassy Terrain is activated while the holder is in battle, this item is consumed and the holder's Defense raises by one stage.
short_effect: Held: Consumed on Grassy Terrain and raises the holder's Defense by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Defense
on Grassy Terrain. It can only be used once.
